Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Electrochemical reduction facilitated by ligand active sites

Other Information.Test Conditions: -1.1 V (vs. RHE), CO2-saturated 0.25 M K2SO4 solution, pH 4.2, room temperature, atmospheric pressure
Other Information.Additional Info: Maximum CO Faradaic efficiency of 81.0% at -1.1 V, highest CO current density of 6.9 mA cm-2 at -1.1 V.

Experimental Validation.Method: Breakthrough experiment, in situ X-ray absorption spectroscopy (XAS), density functional theory (DFT) calculations
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: CO Faradaic efficiency: 81.0% at -1.1 V, CO current density: 6.9 mA cm-2 at -1.1 V

Other Information.Additional Info: Active sites for CO2RR are imidazolate ligands coordinated with the Zn(II) center.
